# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-102">Seguridad Outlook.com avanzada para suscriptores de Microsoft 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-103">Todos los usuarios de Outlook.com se benefician del filtrado de correo no deseado y malware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-104">Para los suscriptores de Office 365 Home y Office 365 personal, Outlook.com realiza una detección adicional de los datos adjuntos y los vínculos de los mensajes que recibe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-105">Para obtener más información, vea [Advanced Outlook.com Security for Microsoft 365 Subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-106">Para activar o desactivar vínculos seguros, vaya a la configuración de [seguridad Premium](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0ddc5-107">**Configuración** > de**seguridad\*\*\*\*Premium** > ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ddc5-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
